meanings.definition: Having a deep, resonant sound quality.
meanings.sent1: The speaker had a very bassy sound.
meanings.sent2: The bassy music made the room vibrate.
meanings.sent3: The bassy voice of the actor made everyone stop and listen.
meanings.sent4: The bassy hum of the engine filled the garage.
meanings.sent5: The bassy notes of the cello echoed through the concert hall.

meanings.definition: Characterized by an emphasis on low frequencies.
meanings.sent1: The bassy tones of the song were soothing.
meanings.sent2: The bassy quality of the movie soundtrack added depth.
meanings.sent3: The bassy beat of the drum made everyone start dancing.
meanings.sent4: The bassy rumble of thunder could be heard in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The bassy sound of the waves crashing on the shore was calming.

meanings.sent1: The bassy speaker filled the room with music.
meanings.sent2: The bassy guitar added richness to the song.
meanings.sent3: The bassy thump of the bass drum could be felt in your chest.
meanings.sent4: The bassy roar of the lion echoed through the jungle.
meanings.sent5: The bassy sound of the organ reverberated in the church.
